abstract: Bob Page, whose company Replacements Ltd was only one in North Carolina in 2012 to publicly oppose constitutional amendment banning gay marriage, marries his longtime partner after amendment was struck down in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Bob Page, who took a lonely stand against a North Carolina constitutional amendment banning same-sex marriage, married his longtime partner on Wednesday — in North Carolina.

headline.main: An Update: A Voice for Gay Marriage, Now Wed
headline.print_headline: Update: A Voice for Gay Marriage, Now Wed

snippet: Bob Page, who took a lonely stand against a North Carolina constitutional amendment banning same-sex marriage, married his longtime partner on Wednesday — in North Carolina.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
